fees.description:
A $14.52 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move).
You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/2402/Additional-charges
A 0.27% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
$2.15 (incl GST) applies for each paper bill.
A 0.65% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.33% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.67% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by American Express credit card.

gasContract.terms: Not available all areas or property types. Residential customers only. See www.originenergy.com.au/2889/Terms-and-conditions for more.
gasContract.variation: Your usage and supply Charges and other charges such as Green Product Charges may change during the Energy Plan period. If they do change, weâ€™ll let you know at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.

incentives.eligibility: You will receive up to 5000 one-off Everyday Rewards points, approximately 45 days after your Acceptance date and ongoing 1 Everyday Rewards point per $1 (incl GST) charged on your bill for your usage and supply during energy plan period.

If you take up Origin Go Zero Natural Gas, we will offset the greenhouse gas emissions from your gas supply through Climate Active, a government backed certification scheme. The cost is $1.50 per week(Incl. GST).

If you opt in for Origin Go Zero Natural Gas, you will be eligible to receive one-off bonus 2000 Everyday Rewards points. These points will be deposited into your Everyday Rewards account approx. 45 days from the date you signed up to this Energy Plan.

eligibility.information: Offer only available to registered Everyday Rewards membership at the time of sign-up.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: We'll give you notice before your contract ends. At the end of the contract term, we will continue to sell you energy and the terms and conditions of the Standard Retail Contract will apply, unless you tell us otherwise.
